title: Indigenous Culture-Integrated Program for Strengthening Fundamental Mathematical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operation skills and practical everyday mathematics application experience
context.additional_context: Designed for Indigenous cultural background learners in medical/legal/technical professions to apply mathematical problem-solving skills to job contexts

learning_goals: Learners can solve mathematical problems arising in daily life and workplace scenarios through case analyses reflecting cultural contexts.
Learners can connect Indigenous traditional knowledge (e.g., land measurement, resource distribution) to modern mathematical concepts (algebra, statistics) for explanatory purposes.
Learners can assess and refine the cultural appropriateness of mathematical problem-solving strategies through peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
